title: Our Lady of Kursk
brief_description: Relates the history of the icon known as Our Lady of Kursk, from its early history, starting in 1295, to the present day, including numerous miracles attributed to it. The opening scenes are of the occasion, in 1964, when the icon was brought to Australia, including the service at the Peter and Paul Church in Strathfield, N.S.W.
